name: Hoshikawa Sara 星川サラ / Nijisanji
description:
weight 0.7 is best.


outfit A (With jacket)
hs1, red eyes, yellow eyes, side ponytail, x hair ornament, thigh strap, blue shorts, front-tie top, hair ribbon, midriff, panty straps, white shirt, black choker, open jacket

outfit A (Without Jacket)
hs1, red eyes, yellow eyes, side ponytail, x hair ornament, thigh strap, blue shorts, front-tie top, hair ribbon, midriff, panty straps, sleeveless, white shirt, black choker

outfit B (Long hair)
hs1, red eyes, yellow eyes, hair bow, long sleeves, short shorts, off shoulder, plaid, black pantyhose, red sweater, black choker

outfit B (Side Ponytail)
hs1, red eyes, yellow eyes, side ponytail, x hair ornament, long sleeves, short shorts, off shoulder, plaid, black pantyhose, red sweater, black choker

outfit C (With jacket)
hs1, red eyes, yellow eyes, twintails, hair ribbon, long sleeves, red bow, pink cardigan, black thighhighs, plaid skirt, black choker, garter straps, school uniform, black jacket, open jacket

outfit C (Without jacket)
hs1, red eyes, yellow eyes, twintails, hair ribbon, long sleeves, red bow, pink cardigan, black thighhighs, plaid skirt, red ribbon, black choker, garter straps, school uniform

I uploaded a sample image of the outfit as a post.

I apologize for the long trigger words, but there are some outfits that would be omitted if I condensed them into trigger words, so I had to use long trigger words.
